info.name: Tumblr - Klaine icon set
info.description: Replace your Tumblr home, inbox, help, preferences, and logout buttons with a ring, a Lima Bean coffee mug, Blaine's bow tie, the Warblers logo (to represent Pavarotti), and a rose!
info.additionalInfo: Contact me on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions/problems/requests. The Klaine logo shown in the second picture was also made by me, and can be found here - [x] Edited on 12/09/14: Updated to work with Tumblr's formatting changes. Please note that the Warblers logo will only appear if you have XKit installed.
